about_the_game:
Get access to an exclusive bundle of optional in-game consumables that can empower you and hasten your progression through THIEF.

The Ghost Booster Pack contains the following items:


  • Lockpick Quality Level 3 (Massively increases lockpicking sensitivity)
  • Water arrows (40)
  • Rope arrows (20)
  • Gold (750)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10.5
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB*
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Additional Notes:
    • * Nvidia 6xx series, AMD 5000 series or Intel Iris Pro required.
    • * Due to a graphics card driver issue, Thief is not supported on AMD graphics cards in macOS 10.12 Sierra and later
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11.1
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB*
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Additional Notes:
    • * Nvidia 6xx series, AMD 5000 series or Intel Iris Pro required.
    • * Due to a graphics card driver issue, Thief is not supported on AMD graphics cards in macOS 10.12 Sierra and later
